name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_223Ra
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Ra" means the element "radium" and "223Ra" is the isotope "radium-223" with a half-life of 1.14e+01 days.
